resources.string:
RULES :

Welcome to Atlas

 • In Atlas, the one who plays first (P1) has to name a valid place and P2 has to give another valid place starting from the end alphabet of the initial place given by the opposition(P1).
 No place should be repeated in a given round. This goes on until either of the player gives an incorrect/invalid place.

 • "Easy mode" : Only countries will be accepted as valid places.
 • "Hard mode" : Countries, states and cities will be accepted as valid places.
